name: Dropdown Menu
author: Karthik Viswanathan
description: A menu, triggered by a click, that prompts the user to select an option from a list.

events.show: Triggered when the dropdown menu is shown.
events.hide: Triggered when the dropdown menu is hidden. Event object contains a selectedItem property that holds which li was selected.
events.select: Triggered on a list item when it is selected.

methods.show: Shows this dropdown menu and waits for user input.
methods.hide: Hides this dropdown menu given which li was selected.
